name: Gunship tank Battle
description:
Soldier in This mission you have to save your base from enemy, tanks are approaching towards your important military base with secret weapons ,trucks , tanks and laser weapons.


Drive your tank out of base and Destroy incoming enemy tanks.

Your tanks is world best tank,prove yourself as best driver,aim the incoming tanks your tank will automatically lock the target then fire the missile to destroy those tanks.


Best for luck with Desert military base rescue mission.

Don't forget to review this game.
